title: Trump Faces Revised Charges In Election Subversion, Calls It "Witch Hunt"
content: Prosecutors on Tuesday filed a revised indictment of Donald Trump, pressing ahead with bombshell charges that he tried to overturn the 2020 US election after losing to Joe Biden.
summary: Prosecutors on Tuesday filed a revised indictment of Donald Trump, pressing ahead with bombshell charges that he tried to overturn the 2020 US election after losing to Joe Biden.

title: First January 6 Rioter To Breach US Capitol Jailed For More Than 4 Years
content: A Kentucky man who was the first rioter to enter the US Capitol during the January 6, 2021, attack on Congress by Donald Trump supporters was sentenced to 53 months in prison on Tuesday.
summary: A Kentucky man who was the first rioter to enter the US Capitol during the January 6, 2021, attack on Congress by Donald Trump supporters was sentenced to 53 months in prison on Tuesday.

title: Trump, Kamala Harris Agree To Mute Mics For September 10 Debate
content: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Tuesday an agreement has been reached to have closed microphones at the Sept. 10 U.S. presidential debate with Democratic rival Kamala Harris.
summary: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump said on Tuesday an agreement has been reached to have closed microphones at the Sept. 10 U.S. presidential debate with Democratic rival Kamala Harris.

title: North Korea's Kim Jong Un Attends Test-Firing Of Rocket Launcher
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un attended the test of an upgraded 240 mm rocket launcher system, state media said on Wednesday.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un attended the test of an upgraded 240 mm rocket launcher system, state media said on Wednesday.

title: Ukraine Claims Seizure Of 100 Settlements In Russia
content: Ukrainian troops have seized 100 settlements in Russia since they broke into bordering Russia's Kursk region on August 6, Oleksandr Syrsky, Commander-in-Chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, said.
summary: Ukrainian troops have seized 100 settlements in Russia since they broke into bordering Russia's Kursk region on August 6, Oleksandr Syrsky, Commander-in-Chief of the Ukrainian Armed Forces, said.

title: Trump Agrees To Debate With Kamala Harris, Outlines Specific Rules
content: Ahead of the presidential elections in the United States, former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump accepted the debate with Vice President Kamala Harris, outlining specific conditions and rules for the face-off.
summary: Ahead of the presidential elections in the United States, former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump accepted the debate with Vice President Kamala Harris, outlining specific conditions and rules for the face-off.

title: WHO Says Droplets A Minor Route Of Mpox Spread. What We Know So Far
content: The World Health Organization (WHO) said today that droplets were a "minor" route of transmission for mpox compared to physical contact, saying that more research is required to understand how the virus spreads.
summary: The World Health Organization (WHO) said today that droplets were a "minor" route of transmission for mpox compared to physical contact, saying that more research is required to understand how the virus spreads.

title: Trump's Edge Over Kamala Harris On Economy, Crime Is Eroding: Report
content: Donald Trump's advantage over Kamala Harris on the economy and crime is eroding among U.S. voters, a sign the Democratic vice president's campaign is gathering momentum ahead of the Nov. 5 presidential election, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.
summary: Donald Trump's advantage over Kamala Harris on the economy and crime is eroding among U.S. voters, a sign the Democratic vice president's campaign is gathering momentum ahead of the Nov. 5 presidential election, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Ukraine Wants Next Peace Summit To Be Held In Global South
content: The Ukrainian presidency on Tuesday said it wanted the next peace summit aimed at ending the conflict in Ukraine to be held in a country of the Global South.
summary: The Ukrainian presidency on Tuesday said it wanted the next peace summit aimed at ending the conflict in Ukraine to be held in a country of the Global South.

title: Motorcyclist Dies In Collision On British Highway
content: Despite efforts by an off-duty doctor and ambulance staff, the man was pronounced dead at the scene.
summary: Despite efforts by an off-duty doctor and ambulance staff, the man was pronounced dead at the scene.

title: Australia Restricts Foreign Student Intake For 2025, Indians Impacted
content: Australia has announced that it will be limiting its international student intake to 2.7 lakh in 2025 in a bid to tackle record levels of migration that has led to skyrocketing house rental prices.
summary: Australia has announced that it will be limiting its international student intake to 2.7 lakh in 2025 in a bid to tackle record levels of migration that has led to skyrocketing house rental prices.

title: US Woman Handcuffed Son, Allowed Him To Be Mauled By Pitbull: Police
content: The incident occurred on August 17, 2024, in Savannah, Ohio. Police found the child in serious condition and quickly transported him to the hospital.
summary: The incident occurred on August 17, 2024, in Savannah, Ohio. Police found the child in serious condition and quickly transported him to the hospital.

title: Regret Not Speaking Out: Mark Zuckerberg On US Pressure Over Covid Posts
content: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg believes US government pressure on his social media platforms to take down certain Covid-19 content in 2021 was "wrong", according to a letter submitted to a US congressional committee.
summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg believes US government pressure on his social media platforms to take down certain Covid-19 content in 2021 was "wrong", according to a letter submitted to a US congressional committee.

title: $2.5 Billion Public Funds Stolen In Iraq's "Heist Of The Century"
content: An Iraqi criminal court on Tuesday issued arrest warrants for a businessman and a former government official wanted over their alleged involvement in stealing $2.5 billion of public funds.
summary: An Iraqi criminal court on Tuesday issued arrest warrants for a businessman and a former government official wanted over their alleged involvement in stealing $2.5 billion of public funds.

title: PM Modi To Visit Singapore Soon. A Look At The Likely Agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to visit Singapore soon to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The specific dates for the prime minister's official visit are not known yet, but it will happen shortly, a top official said
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi is likely to visit Singapore soon to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The specific dates for the prime minister's official visit are not known yet, but it will happen shortly, a top official said

title: Russia Says West Playing With Fire, Warns US Of Risks Of World War III
content: Russia said the West was playing with fire by considering allowing Ukraine to strike deep into Russia with Western missiles and cautioned the United States on Tuesday that World War Three would not be confined to Europe.
summary: Russia said the West was playing with fire by considering allowing Ukraine to strike deep into Russia with Western missiles and cautioned the United States on Tuesday that World War Three would not be confined to Europe.

title: 5 More Murder Cases Against Sheikh Hasina, Total Count Now 71: Report
content: Five more murder cases have been filed against Bangladesh's ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina taking the total number of cases filed against the Awami League leader to 71, a media report said on Tuesday.
summary: Five more murder cases have been filed against Bangladesh's ousted prime minister Sheikh Hasina taking the total number of cases filed against the Awami League leader to 71, a media report said on Tuesday.

title: Gaza Hostage Rescued After 10 Months "In Complex Operation", Says Israel
content: Israeli troops have recovered an Israeli hostage in "a complex rescue operation" in the southern Gaza Strip, the military said on Tuesday, more than 10 months after he was abducted by Hamas-led gunmen on Oct. 7.
summary: Israeli troops have recovered an Israeli hostage in "a complex rescue operation" in the southern Gaza Strip, the military said on Tuesday, more than 10 months after he was abducted by Hamas-led gunmen on Oct. 7.

title: Woman Dies On First Day Of Burning Man Festival, Cause Under Investigation
content: Authorities noted that the death occurred before the official start of the event, which festival organizers confirmed began at 6 p.m.
summary: Authorities noted that the death occurred before the official start of the event, which festival organizers confirmed began at 6 p.m.

title: French Museum Invites Nude Visitors To Explore History Of Naturism In Europe
content: A museum in southern French city Marseille is inviting visitors to discover Europe's relationship to the naturist lifestyle by wandering its halls in the nude.
summary: A museum in southern French city Marseille is inviting visitors to discover Europe's relationship to the naturist lifestyle by wandering its halls in the nude.
